content.rendered:
California Consumer Privacy Act

The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) provides California residents with specific rights regarding their personal information.Under the CCPA, subject to certain exemptions, you may:

  • Request information about how the Westamerica family of companies collects your personal information.
  • Receive a portable copy of collected personal information.
  • Request the deletion of personal information.

You are guaranteed not to be discriminated against for exercising your privacy rights under the CCPA.To make a request under the CCPA, complete the online form below or call us at 1-800-848-1088.

[tcb-script src=”https://fs21.formsite.com/include/form/embedManager.js?1618025530″][/tcb-script][tcb-script]EmbedManager.embed({key: “https://fs21.formsite.com/res/showFormEmbed?EParam=m_OmK8apOTDKNmpA38FX2WrYe2Y6sJfY&1618025530”,width: “100%”});[/tcb-script]

You may also submit a written request to: 

Westamerica BankCCPA MAC B-2NPO Box 1200Suisun City, CA 94585
